meta.siteDescription: Astoria Pacific - ISO13485 certified specialists in 3D printed fluidics and medical devices
meta.companyTagline: ISO13485 certified specialists in 3D printed fluidics and medical device manufacturing

hero.heading: Fluidic and medical device 3D printing in our ISO13485 certified print facility
hero.subheading: Leveraging decades of medical device manufacturing experience Astoria-pacific is now offering customers acces to our printing capabilities. Astoria pacific has years of experice printing parts for our invitro medical diagnostic equipment. We print UL94V-0 rated materials for electrical and optical component houseings and direct chemistry contact fluidics.

items.title: ISO13485 Certified
items.text: Our facility maintains rigorous quality management systems with 10+ years of experience incorporating 3D printed components in medical diagnostic devices.

items.title: Carbon 3D Partner
items.text: As a certified Carbon 3D partner, we utilize CLIP technology for end-use production parts, with seamless scaling from prototyping to full production quantities.

items.title: Diagnostic Expertise
items.text: Decades of experience designing and manufacturing in-vitro medical diagnostic devices, with specialized knowledge in fluid handling systems.

items.title: End-to-End Support
items.text: Comprehensive engineering and manufacturing services from concept through production, all within our ISO 13485 certified quality system.

materials.heading: Advanced Engineering Materials
materials.subheading: Field-proven materials for critical medical and diagnostic applications

specs.name: Chemical Compatibility
specs.value: Polar and non-polar solvent resistant options

specs.name: Certified Performance
specs.value: NASA ASTM E595 certified materials for low outgassing

services.heading: Precision Fluidic Solutions
services.subheading: Advanced 3D printed components with direct experience in reagent contact applications

items.title: Microfluidic Systems
items.text: Precision-engineered microchannels and reaction chambers for diagnostic applications, with novel techniques for printing long internal channels.

items.title: Complex Manifolds
items.text: Multi-input fluid routing systems with integrated valving and channel geometries impossible to manufacture with traditional methods.

items.title: Diagnostic Components
items.text: Specialized components for in-vitro diagnostic devices, with proven field performance in direct contact with reagents and reactions.

caseStudy.heading: Revolutionizing Diagnostic Device Manufacturing
caseStudy.text: Learn how our ISO13485 certified 3D printing process enabled a leading diagnostic company to integrate complex fluidic channels, reducing assembly steps while improving performance and reliability.

partnership.heading: Carbon 3D Certified Partner
partnership.text: Leverage the full capabilities of Carbon's revolutionary CLIP technology for your medical device components
benefits: Scale seamlessly from prototyping to full production quantities
Consistent part quality across production runs
Advanced engineering materials designed for critical end-use applications

dfam.heading: Design for Additive Manufacturing
dfam.text: Optimize fluid handling systems with our specialized 3D printing expertise
benefits: Eliminate assembly points and potential leak paths with monolithic designs
Create complex internal geometries not possible with traditional manufacturing
Optimize fluid flow with novel channel designs
Integrate multiple functions within a single component

testimonial.heading: Industry Validation
testimonial.quote: Astoria Pacific's ISO13485 certified 3D printing services allowed us to integrate complex fluid handling directly into our diagnostic device. Their materials expertise and medical device manufacturing experience were invaluable to our product development process.
testimonial.author: Director of Engineering | Leading IVD Manufacturer

cta.heading: Transform Your Medical Device Design
cta.text: Discuss your project with our ISO13485 certified engineering team
